#summary redirectTo([back,addToken,statusCode,route,controller,action,key,params,anchor,onlyPath,host,protocol,port])
#labels api,1.0,controller,request

*Category*:

[ControllerRequestFunctions Controller Request Functions]

*Description*:

Redirects the browser to the supplied controller/action/key, route or back to the referring page. Internally It uses the [URLFor URLFor()] function to build the link and the `cflocation` tag to perform the redirect.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *back* || boolean || false || false || Set to true to redirect back to the referring page ||
|| *addToken* || boolean || false || false || See documentation for `cflocation` ||
|| *statusCode* || numeric || false || 302 || See documentation for `cflocation` ||
|| *route* || string || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *controller* || string || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *action* || string || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *key* || any || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *params* || string || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *anchor* || string  || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *onlyPath* || boolean || false || true || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *host* || string || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *protocol* || string || false ||   || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||
|| *port* || numeric || false || 0 || See documentation for [URLFor URLFor()] ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfif user.save()>
  <cfset redirectTo(action="saveSuccessful")>
</cfif>
}}}

{{{
<cfset redirectTo(controller="checkout", action="start", params="type=express", protocol="https")>
}}}

{{{
<cfset redirectTo(route="profile", screenName="Joe")>
}}}

{{{
<cfset redirectTo(back=true)>
}}}
